game.name: The Cursed Ward
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A system-driven psychological horror game where every threat has a pattern and every death has a reason.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A system-driven psychological horror game where every threat has a pattern and every death has a reason.
